|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM49408; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-B53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.8 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16EP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53134;BCM53134SKFBG, TN1710 P21, 488-06 P3 W; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.37 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, VHT160, AiMesh, WTFast, TWT, LACP, Link Aggregation, AiProtection, DFS (master/slave), |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN LNA;Skyworks;SKY85216-11;SKY11, 85216, 2I000;4; ,,, 2.4GHz WLAN PAM;Skyworks;SKY85006-11;85006-11, 60068, 1715 MX;4; ,,, 5GHz WLAN HP FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;85743, 62475, 1733 MX;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |serial_port_info = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |tpfirmware = AsusWRT-Merlin
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/14/2018 |estreldate = 10/10/2018 |estprice = 350 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833320370 |asin = B07HM6KJN8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1743 P11, X1S-01 N2 W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 4804 |nqam1 = 4333 |rad1ac = 3466 |rad1n = 1000 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1743 P11, X1S-01 N2 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 1148 |nqam2 = 1000 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *''AX6000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' :Supporting MU-MIMO and OFDMA technology, :built-in WTFast game accelerator and Adaptive QoS, :with AiProtection network security powered by Trend Micro
*Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS RT-AX95U|ASUS RT-AC88U|H3C WA6528}}
The following models are mentioned as being identical in the DFS :Test Report at the FCC: *ASUS RT-AX88U, RT-AX88A, RT-AX88P, RT-AX88R, RT-AX6000 <!--{{FCC ST|08/13/2018|indexme.}}--> "RT-AX88U REV 2.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The CPU ID is not legible in the FCC photos.
<small> *'''Next-Gen WiFi Standard''' - 802.11ax WiFi standard for better efficiency and throughput *'''Ultrafast WiFi Speed''' - 6 Gbps WiFi speed to handle even the busiest network with ease *'''Wider Usage and More Convenience''' - 4 antennas + 8 LAN ports to support more clients *'''Commercial-grade Security''' - AiProtection, powered by Trend Micro, blocks internet :security threats for all your connected smart devices *'''Better Partner with Mesh System''' - Compatible with ASUS AiMesh WiFi system for :seamless whole-home coverage </small>
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family ''ASUS RT-AX88U, Lyra Mesh Family'' (CES 2018) on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/2018/01/08/asus-rt-ax88u-router-ces-2018/ ''ASUS RT-AX88U (CES 2018) - First 802.11ax WiFi Router'' on '''EnGadget'''] *[https://press.asus.com/release.php?id=114 ''ASUS Presents The Edge of Beyond at IFA 2017 (ASUS RT-AX88U)'' on '''ASUS'''] <!-- <small>"ASUS RT-AX88U is the first ASUS router with next-generation 802.11ax Wi-Fi, :supporting unprecedented combined speeds of up to 5952 Mbps (6 Gbps) :- 1148 Mbps on the 2.4GHz band and 4804 Mbps on the 5GHz band. With a revolutionary combination of OFDMA and MU-MIMO technology, 802.11ax technology :provides 4x-faster throughput than 802.11ac technology on connected devices in dense :environments, while also increasing network capacity and efficiency. ASUS RT-AX88U supports more simultaneous data transfers than 802.11ac MU-MIMO routers, :allowing more devices to have faster network access at the same time without waiting :for each other - perfect for homes with a growing number of smart, connected devices. RT-AX88U uses TWT technology to reduce unnecessary communications to 802.11ax devices, :reducing power consumption and improving device battery life."</small> --> *[https://betanews.com/2017/08/30/asus-rt-ac88u-rt-ax88u-wi-fi-routers/ ''ASUS unveils the ultra-fast RT-AX88U 802.11ax Wi-Fi router'' on '''BetaNews'''] *[https://nl.hardware.info/nieuws/53279/ifa-asus-toont-extreem-snelle-80211ax-router ''IFA: ASUS toont extreem snelle 802.11ax-router'' on '''Hardware.info'''] ([https://content.hwigroup.net/images/editorial/1920/010462_foto_30-08-17_13_50_01.jpg image]) *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/12871/asus-announces-a-complete-lineup-of-80211ax-routers ''ASUS Announces a Complete Lineup of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''AnandTech'''] :ASUS: ROG Rapture GT-AX11000, AiMesh AX6100 WiFi System, RT-AX88U
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33217-first-wifi6-peek-asus-rt-ax88u-netgear-rax80 ''First peek at Wi-Fi 6: ASUS RT-AX88U & Netgear RAX80'' on '''SNB'''] *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-rt-ax88u-review ''ASUS RT-AX88U: The first Wi-Fi 6 router'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/8937/asus-rt-ax88u-wi-fi-6-router-review/index.html ''Asus RT-AX88U: Our first look at WiFi 6'' on '''TweakTown''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-rt-ax88u.41020/ ''ASUS RT-AC88U'' on '''SNB''' forums] (''ASUS GT-AX6000'' ROG - '''RMerlin''') *[http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2662797 ''ASUS RT-AX88U'' on '''WhirlPool''' forums] ('''pete y testing''''s posts) *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?35788-ASUS-RT-AX88U-%F1-%EF%EE%E4%E4%E5%F0%E6%EA%EE%E9-802-11ax ''ASUS RT-AX88U'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] ([http://wl500g.info/entry.php?10248-ASUS-RT-AX88U '''Omega''''s blog]) *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31590438-Hardware-RT-AX88U-the-first-802-11ax-ASUS-router ''ASUS RT-AX88U - 802.11ax router'' on '''DSLReports''' forums] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1901-asus-rt-ax88u-80211ax-wi-fi/ ''ASUS RT-AX88U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL)
==See also== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[ASUS RT-AX58U]] - ''AX3000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router *ASUS RT-AX88U - ''AX6000 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX92U]] - ''AX6100 Dual Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS RT-AX95U]] - ''AX11000 Tri Band 802.11ax WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AX6000]] - ''ROG Rapture AX6000 WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AX11000]] - ''ROG Rapture AX11000 WiFi Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture Tri-Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Dual-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker''
